metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12050 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: SQLiteODBC 0.9996, as packaged for certain Linux distributions as 0.9996-4, has a race condition leading to root privilege escalation because any user can replace a /tmp/sqliteodbc$$ file with new contents that cause loading of an arbitrary library.

criterions.comment: sqliteodbc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
